front.court: BEFORE THE MADURAI BENCH OF MADRAS HIGH COURT
front.respondent:
2.The Secretary,
MDA, HSG.109,
Rajapalayam Taluk Co-operative Housing Society,
Rajapalayam,
Virudhunagar District.
front.extra:
PRAYER:- Writ Petition filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of India,
praying for the issuance of a Writ of Certiorarified Mandamus calling for the
records of the impugned auction notice issued by the first respondent in his
proceedings Ni.Ma.No.231/17-18, dated 14.09.2018 and quash the same as
illegal and further direct the first respondent to consider the petitioner's
representation dated 17.10.2018.
